TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignerActionListCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表智慧標籤面板中的所有項目的彙總。The class represents the aggregation of all the items in a smart tag panel. 類別包含零或多個物件。The class contains zero or more objects. 每一份清單包含零個或多個物件，代表在面板中的實際項目，以及衍生自類別。Each of these lists contains zero or more objects that represent the actual items in the panel and are derived from the class. 下表顯示兩個的技術，可提供來填入的元件，包括自訂控制項的項目面板。The following table shows the two techniques for supplying a to populate the panel with items for components, including custom controls. |技術Technique|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |提取模型Pull model|元件類別，衍生自的設計工具類別中，提供透過此集合屬性。The designer for the component class, which is derived from the class, supplies this collection through the property. 它必須顯示面板時，設計工具的基礎結構就會讀取這個屬性。The designer infrastructure reads this property when it must display the panel.| |推送模型Push model|A或是做為參數的呼叫中提供方法與元件相關聯。A or is supplied as a parameter in a call to the method of the associated with the component.| 設計工具的基礎結構來建立智慧標籤面板，其建構函式接受兩個參數類型建構一個面板。The designer infrastructure constructs a panel by creating a smart tag panel, whose constructor takes two parameters of type . 集合，這些清單，其中包含提取和推送的項目，會合併成一個面板。The collections of lists, which contain the pulled and pushed items, are merged into one panel. 因為它衍生自類別，會使用內部來儲存其集合物件。Because it derives from the class, uses an internal to store its collection of objects. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立集合物件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 如需完整範例，請參閱[How to:將智慧標籤附加至 Windows Form 元件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233)。For a full example, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/CS/smarttags.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/VB/smarttags.vb#8)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/CS/smarttags.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/VB/smarttags.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList[] array, int index);
.method public hidebysig instance void CopyTo(class System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList[] array, int32 index) cil managed
Public Sub CopyTo (array As DesignerActionList(), index As Integer)
public: void CopyTo(cli::array <System::ComponentModel::Design::DesignerActionList ^> ^ array, int index);

param.name: array
param.span: 型別的一維陣列，該陣列是從目前集合複製的元素目的端。

span.span: The one-dimensional array of type that is the destination of the elements copied from the current collection.

param.span: 陣列必須有以零為起始的索引。

span.span: The array must have zero-based indexing.

param.name: index
param.span: 中以零起始的索引，即開始複製的位置。

span.span: The zero-based index in at which copying begins.

summary.span: 從指定的陣列索引開始，複製目前集合的元素至提供的陣列。

span.span: Copies the elements of the current collection into the supplied array, starting at the specified array index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果方法會擲回的例外狀況在複製時，為目的陣列的狀態為未定義。If the method throws an exception while copying, the state of the destination array is undefined. 例如，如果或發生時，目的地陣列可能處於部分填滿的狀態。For example, if an or occurs, the destination array may be left in a partially filled state.

span.span: is .
is less than 0.
is multidimensional.
-or-

exception.span: 目前集合中的元素數目大於從 到目的陣列結尾的可用空間。

span.span: The number of elements in the current collection is greater than the available space from to the end of the destination array.

exception.span: 將目前集合的元素轉型為目的陣列的型別時發生問題，可能由失敗的向下轉型所致。

span.span: A problem occurred casting the elements of the current collection to the type of the destination array, perhaps as the result of a failed downcast.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Insert(int32 index, class System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList value) cil managed
Public Sub Insert (index As Integer, value As DesignerActionList)

param.name: index
param.span: 應在 插入以零為起始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index at which should be inserted.

param.name: value
param.span: 要插入至集合的 。

span.span: The to insert into the collection.

summary.span: 將提供的 插入集合中的指定位置。

span.span: Inserts the supplied into the collection at the specified position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`index`參數的值等於屬性，新的項目加入至集合結尾。If the `index` parameter is equal to the value of the property, the new element is added to the end of the collection. 就內部而言，類別會使用包含其集合物件。Internally, the class uses a to contain its collection of objects. 清單會維護連續項目，因為插入點後面的項目會向下移動以容納新的項目。Because lists maintain contiguous elements, the elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element. 這種重新安排會在插入點後，變更項目的索引。This rearrangement changes the index of the elements after the insertion point.

exception.span: 小於零，或大於目前集合中的元素計數。

span.span: is less than 0 or greater than the count of elements in the current collection.

permission.span: 取得的完整存取系統資源。

span.span: for full access to system resources.
Demand values: , .
Associated state:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Remove(class System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList value) cil managed

param.name: value
param.span: 要從目前集合中移除的 。

span.span: The to remove from the current collection.

summary.span: 從集合移除特定 的第一個元素。

span.span: Removes the first occurrence of a specific from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就內部而言，類別會使用包含其集合物件。Internally, the class uses a to contain its collection of objects. 由於清單維持連續項目，移除點後面的項目會向上移動以佔用空出的位置。Since lists maintain contiguous elements, the elements that follow the removal point move up to occupy the vacated spot. 這種重新安排移除點之後變更項目的索引。This rearrangement changes the index of the elements after the removal point.

permission.span: 取得的完整存取系統資源。
